channel.title: Command Line - David Vargas
channel.description: The Shell A program that takes your commands from the keyboard and sends them to the operating system to perform. Almost all Linux distros will default to the bash shell. Shell prompt , for the most part, adheres to the following format username@hostname:current_directory david@David-Thomas:/$ The $ is for a normal user using bash Some commands: (Case sensitive) $ echo Echo Hello World Output: Hello World $ date Output: Mon Nov 30 09:57:25 MST 2020
